```{r}
library(Mreport)
library(stringr)
```

```{r}
load_base()
load_sample_base()
```

```{r}
allstation <- read.csv("D:\\交大云同步\\实习\\00_交调系统\\交调系统数据\\交调站点管理\\交调站数据.csv",stringsAsFactors=F)
dim(allstation)
```


```{r}
district <- allstation$行政区划
head(district,50)
```

```{r}
pattern <- "(.*(省))|(.*(自治区))|(北京市)|(上海市)|(重庆市)|(天津市)"
x <- str_extract(district,pattern)
unique(x)
```
